en_us: Till some ground by holding a hoe on a Pig Tractor!
Ride pigs through fields to quickly harvest and plant crops! Who knows, maybe you will even dig up some useful things in the process.
Riding a pig while holding a hoe will till grass, dirt, or coarse dirt below the pig, with a chance to drop some loot.
Driving over crops with a Pig Tractor will harvest them.\n\nIf the farmer has seeds or crops in their inventory, the crops will be automatically replanted.
Driving over empty farmland will plant any crops in the farmer's inventory, prioritizing crops in hand.
